official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of Associate Justice Thurgood Marshall.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Thurgood Marshall Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue one-dollar coins emblematic of the tenure of Associate Justice Thurgood Marshall on the Supreme Court of the United States. Mandates that all surcharges received from the sale of such coins be paid to the Supreme Court Historical Society.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of Associate Justice Thurgood Marshall.
